comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: William Gerald Gardner, age 11: www.rmslusitania.info/people/second-cabin/william-gardner/ Eric Clarence Gardner, age 16: www.rmslusitania.info/people/second-cabin/eric-gardner/ Eric died in WWI, in combat at Passchendaele, 1917, age 21. William began having seizures after the Lusitania trauma, and was institutionalized as an epileptic for 40 years, in New Zealand, before being released into the care of his surviving brother Leonard. He died in 1984.

comment.author: 26033330@N00
comment._content: Certainly the worst disaster to have occurred in Irish waters... and there's been a lot of such disasters.
